name: PRASSILANDIA
description:
Interactive game for children affected by face, mouth and tongue dyspraxia (developmental co-ordination disorder)

Application developed for the university course "Soluzioni di grafica 3D in applicazioni biometriche" of Politecnico di Torino

Authors: Federica Barbeni, Emma Caravati, Donato Gentile, Federica Moro, Giacomo Offre
